product.title: Kawaii Cartoon Exotic Fruits Large Mouse Pad
product.body_html:
• Description
  • FAQ
  • Shipping

  • Transform your desk with kawaii exotic fruits

    This will enhance your home or office's space by creating an attractive cute atmosphere featuring a range of fruit designs with a pastel-coloured theme. With a thickness of 3mm, these mousemats are more durable and firm.

    Enhance your gaming and working experience at your desk with our long mousepads designed to provide a seamless surface and accurate movement with no jitters. Choose between 17 different designs!


    Perfect addition to your office, home and even ideal for gifts

    This flexible and durable mouse mat is smooth and soft to the touch making gaming and working at your desk a more comfortable and enjoyable experience.

    Features

    🍓 17 Exotic Fruit designs to choose from
    🍓 4 sizes available
    🍓 3mm thick ✨ NEW ✨
    🍓 Rubber back material to prevent slipping

  • Do you ship worldwide? Yes, we ship to over 300 countries and are proud to provide free shipping to the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, and many countries in Europe.

  • FREE Tracked Shipping to the United States, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, some countries within the EU, and many more. Find out more here: Shipping Policy.


    Packaging time: 1-5 Business days

    Shipping time: 5-20 Business days
